metadata.inclusion: Insert the 3V CR123A Lithium battery with correct polarity, then press the Function Button 3 times within 1 second.
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1 second. The Glass Break Detector will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the batteries from the Glass Break Detector
2. Press and hold the Function Button
3. While holding the Function Button, re-insert the batteries and wait for 10 seconds
